mapper.select: SELECT A.receipt_no AS receiptNo, A.bp AS bp, A.bs AS bs, B.name AS name, B.gender AS gender, B.age AS age, B.address as address, B.insurance_yn AS insurance, B.diagnosis_type AS diagnosis, B.patient_no AS patientNo, A.receipt_dt AS receiptDt, TO_CHAR(receipt_time, 'HH24:MI:SS') as receiptTime, A.remark AS remark, A.state AS state, (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) as no, A.diagnosis_time as diagnosisTime FROM ucare.receipt A INNER JOIN ucare.patient B ON A.patient_no = B.patient_no WHERE TO_CHAR(A.receipt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date } ORDER BY A.receipt_no ASC
